alert.note: Alert for Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Grant Grove Area; Sequoia NP (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 4:55AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL TULARE AND EAST CENTRAL FRESNO COUNTIES THROUGH 530 AM PDT... At 454 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles north of Three Rivers, or 35 miles northeast of Visalia, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Three Rivers, Monarch Ranger Station, Park Ridge, Cedar Grove, Azalea Campground, Mitchell Meadow, Pear Lake Ranger Station, Shadequarter Mtn, Roaring River Ranger Station, Grant Grove, Crystal Springs Campground, Marble Fork Kaweah, Lodgepole Campground, Moraine Campground, Hume Lake, Grant Grove Visitor Center, Lodgepole, Sentinel Campground, Canyon View Campground, and Pinehurst. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Grant Grove Area; Sequoia NP
